EmailTemplate.subject: A Community Solar Share for you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
I'd like to share the sun with you! I've been enjoying saving on my electric bill and greening my footprint through my membership with BlueWave Community Solar and I thought you may like to join, too.
Besides your monthly savings, we each earn $100 if you use my referral code when you sign up!
Just go to bluewavesolar.com/sign-up/ and input my code “{!Contact.Referral_Code__c}” into the Referral Code box.
Not sure if Community Solar is right for you?
Do you live in MA and pay a utility bill? Great! Anyone with a utility bill in MA is eligible for BlueWave Community Solar.
Do you want to save on your monthly costs? 10% savings each month from Community Solar means more money can be spent on groceries, savings for the future, or other things you love!
Do you like fresh, local products? Community Solar means local jobs, local clean energy, and no local emissions.
Happy to share in this fresh, local power with you!
- {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
P.S. Curious about BlueWave?BlueWave Solar is a local renewable energy company on a mission to revolutionize energy with simple, solar solutions. BlueWave is a B Corp which means they believe in doing good things for customers, the industry, and our planet.
